summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, indicating that Epstein is available to discuss Columbia and has not disclosed information to others yet. The email contains a confidentiality notice and suggests a privileged communication.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is the sender of the email, indicating his willingness to discuss matters related to Columbia.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Staley is the recipient of the email from Epstein, suggesting a level of trust and communication between them.

connections.description: Epstein and Staley are in communication regarding matters of interest, indicating a personal or professional relationship.

keyFacts: Epstein expresses his availability to discuss Columbia.
Epstein has not disclosed information to others yet.
The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating it may be attorney-client privileged.
The email suggests a close relationship between Epstein and Staley.
